author: tenq
content: Thanks for the article! I have a question but Iâ€™m not sure if this is the correct location to ask: will validators in the future be able to withdraw funds without exiting? Or will the only way to obtain the funds is by exiting?

content: Should be. As validator accumulate gains, those gains should be allowed to be taken out for other purposes.
